member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.BadgeGlyphNotificationContent
member.summary: Notification content object to display a glyph on a tile's badge.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.IBadgeNotificationContent
member.summary: Base badge notification content interface.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.INotificationContent
member.summary: Base notification content interface to retrieve notification Xml as a string.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.INotificationContent.GetContent
member.summary: Retrieves the notification Xml content as a string.
member.returns: The notification Xml content as a string.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.INotificationContent.GetXml
member.summary: Retrieves the notification Xml content as a WinRT Xml document.
member.returns: The notification Xml content as a WinRT Xml document.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.IBadgeNotificationContent.CreateNotification
member.summary: Creates a WinRT BadgeNotification object based on the content.
member.returns: A WinRT BadgeNotification object based on the content.

member.summary: Default constructor to create a glyph badge content object.

member.summary: Constructor to create a glyph badge content object with a glyph.
member.param: The glyph to be displayed on the badge.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.BadgeGlyphNotificationContent.GetContent
member.summary: Retrieves the notification Xml content as a string.
member.returns: The notification Xml content as a string.

member.summary: Retrieves the notification Xml content as a string.
member.returns: The notification Xml content as a string.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.BadgeGlyphNotificationContent.GetXml
member.summary: Retrieves the notification Xml content as a WinRT Xml document.
member.returns: The notification Xml content as a WinRT Xml document.

member.summary: Creates a WinRT BadgeNotification object based on the content.
member.returns: A WinRT BadgeNotification object based on the content.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.BadgeGlyphNotificationContent.Glyph
member.summary: The glyph to be displayed on the badge.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.BadgeNumericNotificationContent
member.summary: Notification content object to display a number on a tile's badge.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.BadgeNumericNotificationContent.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor to create a numeric badge content object.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.BadgeNumericNotificationContent.#ctor(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Constructor to create a numeric badge content object with a number.
member.param: The number that will appear on the badge. If the number is 0, the badge will be removed. The largest value that will appear on the badge is 99. Numbers greater than 99 are allowed, but will be displayed as "99+".

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.BadgeNumericNotificationContent.GetContent
member.summary: Retrieves the notification Xml content as a string.
member.returns: The notification Xml content as a string.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.BadgeNumericNotificationContent.ToString
member.summary: Retrieves the notification Xml content as a string.
member.returns: The notification Xml content as a string.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.BadgeNumericNotificationContent.GetXml
member.summary: Retrieves the notification Xml content as a WinRT Xml document.
member.returns: The notification Xml content as a WinRT Xml document.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.BadgeNumericNotificationContent.CreateNotification
member.summary: Creates a WinRT BadgeNotification object based on the content.
member.returns: A WinRT BadgeNotification object based on the content.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.BadgeNumericNotificationContent.Number
member.summary: The number that will appear on the badge. If the number is 0, the badge will be removed. The largest value that will appear on the badge is 99. Numbers greater than 99 are allowed, but will be displayed as "99+".

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.INotificationContentText
member.summary: A type contained by the tile and toast notification content objects that represents a text field in the template.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.INotificationContentText.Text
member.summary: The text value that will be shown in the text field.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.INotificationContentText.Lang
member.summary: The language of the text field. This proprety overrides the language provided in the containing notification object. The language should be specified using the abbreviated language code as defined by BCP 47.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.INotificationContentImage
member.summary: A type contained by the tile and toast notification content objects that represents an image in a template.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.INotificationContentImage.Src
member.summary: The location of the image. Relative image paths use the BaseUri provided in the containing notification object. If no BaseUri is provided, paths are relative to ms-appx:///. Only png and jpg images are supported. Images must be 800x800 pixels or less, and smaller than 150 kB in size.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.INotificationContentImage.Alt
member.summary: Alt text that describes the image.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.NotificationBase
member.summary: Base class for the notification content creation helper classes.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.NotificationBase.Images
member.summary: Retrieves the list of images that can be manipulated on the notification content.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.NotificationBase.TextFields
member.summary: Retrieves the list of text fields that can be manipulated on the notification content.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.NotificationBase.BaseUri
member.summary: The base Uri path that should be used for all image references in the notification.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.NotificationContentValidationException
member.summary: Exception returned when invalid notification content is provided.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.TileContent.ITileNotificationContent
member.summary: Base tile notification content interface.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.TileContent.ITileNotificationContent.CreateNotification
member.summary: Creates a WinRT TileNotification object based on the content.
member.returns: The WinRT TileNotification object

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.TileContent.ITileNotificationContent.StrictValidation
member.summary: Whether strict validation should be applied when the Xml or notification object is created, and when some of the properties are assigned.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.TileContent.ITileNotificationContent.Lang
member.summary: The language of the content being displayed. The language should be specified using the abbreviated language code as defined by BCP 47.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.TileContent.ITileNotificationContent.BaseUri
member.summary: The BaseUri that should be used for image locations. Relative image locations use this field as their base Uri. The BaseUri must begin with http://, https://, ms-appx:///, or ms-appdata:///local/.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.TileContent.ITileNotificationContent.Branding
member.summary: Determines the application branding when tile notification content is displayed on the tile.

member.summary: Base wide tile notification content interface.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.TileContent.IWideTileNotificationContent.SquareContent
member.summary: Corresponding square tile notification content should be a part of every wide tile notification.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.TileContent.IWideTileNotificationContent.RequireSquareContent
member.summary: Whether square tile notification content needs to be added to pass validation. Square content is required by default.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.TileContent.TileBranding
member.summary: The types of behavior that can be used for application branding when tile notification content is displayed on the tile.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.TileContent.TileBranding.None
member.summary: No application branding will be displayed on the tile content.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.TileContent.TileBranding.Logo
member.summary: The application logo will be displayed with the tile content.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.TileContent.TileBranding.Name
member.summary: The application name will be displayed with the tile content.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.IToastAudio
member.summary: Type representing the toast notification audio properties which is contained within a toast notification content object.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.IToastAudio.Content
member.summary: The audio content that should be played when the toast is shown.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.IToastAudio.Loop
member.summary: Whether the audio should loop. If this property is set to true, the toast audio content must be a looping sound.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.IToastNotificationContent
member.summary: Base toast notification content interface.

member.name: M:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.IToastNotificationContent.CreateNotification
member.summary: Creates a WinRT ToastNotification object based on the content.
member.returns: A WinRT ToastNotification object based on the content.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.IToastNotificationContent.StrictValidation
member.summary: Whether strict validation should be applied when the Xml or notification object is created, and when some of the properties are assigned.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.IToastNotificationContent.Lang
member.summary: The language of the content being displayed. The language should be specified using the abbreviated language code as defined by BCP 47.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.IToastNotificationContent.BaseUri
member.summary: The BaseUri that should be used for image locations. Relative image locations use this field as their base Uri. The BaseUri must begin with http://, https://, ms-appx:///, or ms-appdata:///local/.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.IToastNotificationContent.Launch
member.summary: The launch parameter passed into the metro application when the toast is activated.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.IToastNotificationContent.Audio
member.summary: The audio that should be played when the toast is displayed.

member.name: P:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.IToastNotificationContent.Duration
member.summary: The length that the toast should be displayed on screen.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastAudioContent
member.summary: The audio options that can be played while the toast is on screen.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastAudioContent.Default
member.summary: The default toast audio sound.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastAudioContent.Mail
member.summary: Audio that corresponds to new mail arriving.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastAudioContent.SMS
member.summary: Audio that corresponds to a new SMS message arriving.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastAudioContent.IM
member.summary: Audio that corresponds to a new IM arriving.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastAudioContent.Reminder
member.summary: Audio that corresponds to a reminder.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastAudioContent.LoopingCall
member.summary: The default looping sound. Audio that corresponds to a call. Only valid for toasts that are have the duration set to "Long".

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastAudioContent.LoopingCall2
member.summary: Audio that corresponds to a call. Only valid for toasts that are have the duration set to "Long".

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastAudioContent.LoopingAlarm
member.summary: Audio that corresponds to an alarm. Only valid for toasts that are have the duration set to "Long".

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastAudioContent.LoopingAlarm2
member.summary: Audio that corresponds to an alarm. Only valid for toasts that are have the duration set to "Long".

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastAudioContent.Silent
member.summary: No audio should be played when the toast is displayed.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastDuration
member.summary: The duration the toast should be displayed on screen.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastDuration.Short
member.summary: Default behavior. The toast will be on screen for a short amount of time.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.ToastContent.ToastDuration.Long
member.summary: The toast will be on screen for a longer amount of time.

member.name: T:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.GlyphValue
member.summary: The types of glyphs that can be placed on a badge.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.GlyphValue.None
member.summary: No glyph. If there is a numeric badge, or a glyph currently on the badge, it will be removed.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.GlyphValue.Activity
member.summary: A glyph representing application activity.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.GlyphValue.Alert
member.summary: A glyph representing an alert.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.GlyphValue.Available
member.summary: A glyph representing availability status.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.GlyphValue.Away
member.summary: A glyph representing away status

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.GlyphValue.Busy
member.summary: A glyph representing busy status.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.GlyphValue.NewMessage
member.summary: A glyph representing that a new message is available.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.GlyphValue.Paused
member.summary: A glyph representing that media is paused.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.GlyphValue.Playing
member.summary: A glyph representing that media is playing.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.GlyphValue.Unavailable
member.summary: A glyph representing unavailable status.

member.name: F:NotificationsExtensions.BadgeContent.GlyphValue.Error
member.summary: A glyph representing an error.
